prompt: Photorealistic macro photograph of the base of an antique glass bottle, showcasing embossed markings and mold seams. Soft, diffused lighting to highlight the details of the glass texture and the manufacturer's mark. Focus on clarity and sharpness, with a shallow depth of field emphasizing the base. Background subtly blurred to provide context but not distract. --ar 16:9
name: old-bottles-identification-image-1.png

prompt: A well-lit workbench scene, showcasing a row of diverse antique bottles, each partially filled with aged liquids of varying colors (amber, green, clear). A magnifying glass is positioned in front of one bottle, revealing its label details. Tools such as calipers, a small brush, and a notebook are scattered around the bottles. Natural light from a window softly illuminates the scene. --ar 16:9
name: old-bottles-identification-image-2.png

prompt: A close-up shot of an antique bottle neck with an applied lip or tooled finish. Focus on the imperfections and craftsmanship of the glasswork. Backlit with a soft glow to emphasize the glass's color and texture. A bokeh background with hints of foliage to suggest the bottle was found outdoors. --ar 16:9
name: old-bottles-identification-image-3.png

prompt: An overhead view of a light table, on which a selection of bottle shards and fragments are carefully arranged. The glass pieces are illuminated from below, showcasing their colors and thicknesses. A ruler is placed alongside the shards for scale. The composition is clean and organized, emphasizing the process of identifying bottle types from fragments. High contrast, scientific style. --ar 16:9
name: old-bottles-identification-image-4.png

prompt: A wide shot of an archeological dig site, with a partially excavated area revealing several antique bottles in situ. The bottles are surrounded by dirt and other artifacts. Warm, golden hour lighting to create a sense of history and discovery. Focus on realism and detail, capturing the textures of the earth and the weathered surfaces of the bottles. --ar 16:9
name: old-bottles-identification-image-5.png
